resources.string: Please hold your breath for as long as you can
This test will help you check if you have any of covid sympthoms

You failed breath holding test but seem to have no additional symptoms.You are not likely to be ill, especially if you always had trouble with holding your breath for long or are in a bad physical condition.
Additionally you failed the breath holding test. You should definitely call a doctor
You should definitely call the doctor
Consider consulting doctor to make sure you are fine.
